short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies crowd cookie to service desk queue alert.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can copy the crowd cookie value after configuring the domain and token key identifier. It can send it also to an external app called "Service Desk Queue Change Alert".
